page.title: 11Village of Durweston 1
page.content: We walked around Durweston looking at the houses. This is what we found. { Walls} Most walls are made of brick.Not very many were made from flint or stone. Brick 48: Stone 9: Flint 5. { Roofs} Most roofs are tiled. Some are made from slate and 2 houses are thatched. Thatch 2: Slate 13: Tile 19. { House, Bungalow or Flat} Most people live in houses. There are not many people living in bungalows and flats. House 77: Bungalow 15: Flat 4. { Names and Numbers} In Haycombe there are more homes with numbers than in Water Lane. However, there are more homes with names in Water Lane. Not very many homes in Durweston have both names and numbers. {
